channel.title: Teleports

item.title: Teleports
item.dc:creator: @i_duh_loot i duh loot
item.description:
@i_duh_loot wrote:

Well in my server, im using delta base
I am trying to make an item teleport you somewere

I have teletabs, and i also want the ring of dueling to work…

Well i folowed the tut on R~S and this is what i have in my client.java

		case 185:
			// clicking most buttons
			actionButtonId =  misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
			if (!validClient)
				break;
			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("delta")){
			println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
			}
			if (!antiHax())
				break;
				resetAction();
				server.clickingMost.clicking(playerId);
				break;

		// the following Ids are the reason why AR-type  cheats are hopeless to
		// make...
		// basically they're just there to make reversing  harder
		case 2968: //Teleportation
		toX = 3052;
		toY = 3499;
		deleteItem(2552, 1);
		addItem(2554, 1);
		sM("You activated the teleport.");
		break;
		case 2552: //Ring of dueling (8)
		toX = 3052;
		toY = 3499;
		deleteItem(2552, 1);
		addItem(2554, 1);
		sM("You rubbed the ring and teleported.");
		break;
		case 2554: //Ring of dueling (7)
		toX = 3098;
		toY = 3499;
		deleteItem(2554, 1);
		addItem(2556, 1);
		sM("You rubbed the ring and teleported.");
		break;
		case 2556: //Ring of dueling (6)
		toX = 2000;
		toY = 4710;
		deleteItem(2556, 1);
		addItem(2558, 1);
		sM("You rubbed the ring and teleported.");
		break;
		case 2781: //Ardougne tablet
		toX = 2384;
		toY = 4710;
		deleteItem(2781, 1);
		sM("You break the tablet and teleport to Ardougne.");
		break;
		case 226:
		case 78:
		case 148:

Is there any problems?

For the case i put the id code of the item…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 06:01:13 pm[/size][hr]OMG, just like always no one helps…ugh
